name: Chad Chop Chefyo
description:
It’s been 10 years since the Vegetabyo™ outbreak. These legions of delicious but deadly vegetables now rule the Earth after overpowering the human race with sheer numbers. Many have given up their hope, their dreams… But not Chad Chop Chefyo. This man now has only one goal in mind - having the best restaurant in the world… and Vegetabyos™ are the main dish.

Gamejam Topics:

Unusual use of Dice: Slice and dice the food!
Legion: Legion of the Vegetabyos
Unexpected Connection: Connection of top-down action shooter and a cooking game
Sense/Meaning: Meaning of the Chad's life is cooking which he hasn't given up even in the apocalypse

Our team:

Cozy Games Studio et al.
